node.name: SurfaceShader
node.author: mesh
node.help: Preset of surface shaders used for background in a preview RIB
node.param_code: print ":: Hello from %s XML code !!!" % self.label if self.getInputParamByName ( 'Shader' ).value == 'null': self.getInputParamByName ( 'FG_surf_name' ).value = '"null"' if self.getInputParamByName ( 'Shader' ).value == 'defaultsurface': self.getInputParamByName ( 'FG_surf_name' ).value = '"defaultsurface"' if self.getInputParamByName ( 'Shader' ).value == 'matte': self.getInputParamByName ( 'FG_surf_name' ).value = '"matte"' if self.getInputParamByName ( 'Shader' ).value == 'plastic': self.getInputParamByName ( 'FG_surf_name' ).value = '"plastic"'
